p coil: It may seem self-explanatory, but keeping the unit clean all year long goes a long way. You can use a high-pressure hose to clean off the fan blades, condensing coils and clean off any dirt or bugs.
p fan: It may seem self-explanatory, but keeping the unit clean all year long goes a long way. You can use a high-pressure hose to clean off the fan blades, condensing coils and clean off any dirt or bugs.
h3 maintenance: PTAC Preventative Maintenance & Winterizartion in New York
h1 maintenance: PTAC Preventative Maintenance for Winter Months
span maintenance: PTAC Preventative Maintenance & Winterizartion in New York

p coil: Covering your unit once these steps are complete is a small form of protection against the harsh winter elements. However, if you do decide to cover it, there is the possibility of moisture getting trapped underneath it, which may lead to the growth of mold. In order to avoid this headache, expose some of the coils to the air so there is still some circulation.
